source:
%%sql

CREATE VIEW IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Grade AS
SELECT
    RANK() OVER(ORDER BY a.Grade) AS dim_grade_key,
    a.*,
    CASE Grade 
        WHEN 'AA' THEN 1
        WHEN 'AO' THEN 3
        WHEN 'APP AO' THEN 2
        WHEN 'EO' THEN 4
        WHEN 'APP EO' THEN 5
        WHEN 'HEO' THEN 6
        WHEN 'SEO' THEN 7
        WHEN 'G7' THEN 8
        WHEN 'G6' THEN 9
        WHEN 'GM' THEN 10
        WHEN 'SCSPB1' THEN 11
        WHEN 'SCSPB2' THEN 12
        ELSE 99
    END AS SortKey
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        CASE COALESCE(PSgroup, 'Unknown')
            WHEN '' THEN '-1'
            WHEN 'Unknown' THEN '-1'
            WHEN 'Not Payroll Relevant' THEN '-1'
            ELSE PSgroup
        END AS Grade,
        CASE PSgroup
            WHEN 'APO' THEN 'Appeal Planning Officer'
            WHEN 'AA' THEN 'Administrative Assistant'
            WHEN 'AO' THEN 'Administrative Officer'
            WHEN 'APP AO' THEN 'Appeals Administrative Assistant'
            WHEN 'APP EO' THEN 'Appeals Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'APP HEO' THEN 'Appeals Higher Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'BAND 1' THEN 'Band 1 Inspector'
            WHEN 'BAND 2' THEN 'Band 2 Inspector'
            WHEN 'BAND 3' THEN 'Band 3 Inspector'
            WHEN 'EO' THEN 'Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'G6' THEN 'Grade 6'
            WHEN 'G7' THEN 'Grade 7'
            WHEN 'GM' THEN 'Group Manager'
            WHEN 'HEO' THEN 'Higher Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'SEO' THEN 'Senior Executive Officer'
            WHEN 'PL' THEN 'Professional Lead'
            WHEN 'SCSPB1' THEN 'Director'
            WHEN 'SCSPB2' THEN 'Chief Executive'
            ELSE 'Unknown'
        END AS GradeDescription,
        CASE
            WHEN PSgroup LIKE 'BAND%' THEN 'Inspector'
            WHEN PSgroup = 'APO' THEN 'Inspector'
            ELSE 'Other Profession'
        END AS Inspector_Support,
        CASE PSgroup
            WHEN 'AA' THEN 'AA'
            WHEN 'APO' THEN 'APO'
            WHEN 'AO' THEN 'AO'
            WHEN 'APP AO' THEN 'AO'
            WHEN 'APP EO' THEN 'EO'
            WHEN 'APP HEO' THEN 'HEO'
            WHEN 'BAND 1' THEN 'BAND 1'
            WHEN 'BAND 2' THEN 'BAND 2'
            WHEN 'BAND 3' THEN 'BAND 3'
            WHEN 'EO' THEN 'EO'
            WHEN 'G6' THEN 'G6'
            WHEN 'G7' THEN 'G7'
            WHEN 'GM' THEN 'G6'
            WHEN 'HEO' THEN 'HEO'
            WHEN 'SEO' THEN 'SEO'
            WHEN 'PL' THEN 'PL'
            WHEN 'SCSPB1' THEN 'G5+'
            WHEN 'SCSPB2' THEN 'G5+'
            ELSE 'Unknown'
        END AS GradeGroup
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
) a

%%sql
create or replace table odw_curated_db.pbi_dim_HR_Grade
using delta
as
SELECT * FROM odw_curated_db.vw_dim_HR_Grade
